effect.black_white: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

flavor_text.black_white: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
